Title: Provides for advance payment of the earned income credit by employers
Summary: Provides for advance payment of the earned income credit by employers, the commissioner of the department of taxation and finance and the commissioner of New York City's department of finance.
LawCode: Add ยง679, Tax L; add ยง11-1763, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to advance payment of the earned income credit
